summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Frontenac Street, from California Avenue to 47th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading, constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7399 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
